definitions.definition: A brief fall of precipitation ( spell of rain , or a similar fall of snow , sleet , or cascade ); burst of hefty precipitation.
examples: Today there will be frequent showers and some sunny spells.

definitions.definition: A device for bathing by which water is made to fall on the body from a height, either from a tank or by the action of a pump.
An instance of using of this device in order to bathe oneself.
examples: I’m going to have a shower .
I’m going to take a shower .

definitions.definition: A quantity of something that has characteristics of a rain shower.
examples: a shower of sparks;  a meteor shower ;  a Gatorade shower

definitions.definition: A party associated with a significant event in a person's life, at which the person usually receives gifts.
examples: Would male strippers be appropriate for the divorce shower ?
Her church group has planned an adoption shower .
The shower will be held at the home of the bridesmaid.
Her friends are throwing her a shower after her mom leaves.

definitions.definition: ( juggling ) A pattern where the juggler passes objects horizontally from one hand to the other around chest height, and upward over the juggler's head to return to the first hand.
( obsolete ) A battle , an attack ; conflict .
( chiefly Ireland , UK , Australia , derogatory ) A shower of shit .
( chiefly Ireland , euphemistic , derogatory , with of and an invective ) Used as an intensifying pluralizer or intensifier
( British , informal , in the singular ) A group of people perceived as incompetent or worthless.

main_definition: A brief fall of precipitation ( spell of rain , or a similar fall of snow , sleet , or cascade ); burst of hefty precipitation.

definitions.definition: An object or activity that is shown in a contest.
examples: That calf is going to be a great shower at the fair this year.

definitions.definition: A man whose penis is close to its full ( erect ) size when flaccid , or the penis itself.

secondary_definitions: An object or activity that is shown in a contest.
( slang ) A man whose penis is close to its full ( erect ) size when flaccid , or the penis itself. [from 1990s]
